name: reky (itch)
description:
“like a deep, centering breath in the corner of a quiet museum”
 Eurogamer

“the game we’d most like to unwind with”
 NME

“one of the most elegant, designerly games ever made for touchscreen”
 Metro UK

“#4 puzzle games out this week”

“a clever logic puzzler with clean aesthetics”
 Toucharcade

A logic puzzle game, reky marries an elegance of design with an architectural minimalist aesthetic to create an experience that is fresh, stylish and satisfyingly challenging. Using the one-finger touch controls, the player interacts with the different puzzle elements of each level, shifting and moving them in order to create a path to the goal. Everything in the game is simple and functional, with only cubes, lines, exits, portals and a dash of color used to create a large variety of brain-teasing challenges.

  • Elegant logic puzzles, escalating to extreme challenge levels
  • Aesthetics inspired by architectural minimalism
  • Crystal clear visuals
  • Beautiful ambient soundtrack
  • 96 levels to test yourself across
